name: Fishing Asteroids
description:
Fishing Asteroids is a mix between fishing games and the classic Asteroids for the Ludum Dare 41.

  • Hook fish and reel them into your boat for points.
  • Hook asteroids and reel them to destroy them before they crash into you.

Enjoy drifting away in space while catching fish.

PS: Try the Downloadable PC version for the best experience! :)
